thread.title_full: Online Shopping Carts: Examining the Top 3 Solutions!

author: Julien Brandt, San Diego Online Marketing Examiner
title: Online Shopping Carts: Examining the Top 3 Solutions!
text:
Online shopping cart solutions Image credit: Pixabay 
With the emerging trends in technology, many businesses are expanding all over the world, and customers are now able to buy goods from any part of the world from the comfort of their homes without having to travel. This has led to immense growth for online businesses that offer products for purchase online. Online shopping has now been made to resemble a trip to your local shops, but with much easier access and more choices. Customers can now make wish lists for items they want to buy and save them for a later date. The virtual shopping cart makes our world all that much easier when it comes to the shopping experience. Due to the high demand for shopping carts resulting from the online shopping space, more and more companies are offering ecommerce businesses a variety of solutions to manage the experience on the front end (to the consumer) and the backend (to the business itself). With so many options out there, it can be a challenge to make the right choice. The good news is that these shopping cart solutions are actually ranked depending on their reliability, their payment methods and customer satisfaction. 
Below is a list of the top three shopping cart solutions: 
Shopify This option provides secure and reliable shopping cart solution for any person willing to engage in an e-commerce website. The shopping cart allows the use of credit cards and PayPal payments which helps to integrate with more than fifty payment gateways. This leaves the door open for more buyers to purchase from their website. 
If security is a concern, rest assured you purchase safely because data and credit cards are encrypted. It uses 256-bit SSL certificate and is a Level 1 PCI compliant making it very protected. Customers can pay for their items using Mastercard, Amex, Visa or other globally accepted cards and also PayPal. 
The shopping cart uses the local currency, and it is automated to calculate tax depending on where the buyers and the business are located. The user can customize the checkout page to the language of their choice since there are more than fifty available languages. It connects with other fulfilment services like Rakuten Super Logistics ; Shipwire and Amazon Services which allow customers to fulfill and ship their orders effortlessly. 
Contentshelf This shopping cart is very easy to use because it has an intuitive interface, and the navigation is fairly straight forward. Customers can easily find their items on the Shelf, which creates more selling power to the business. They offer a free version which makes it appealing for start-ups on a budget, and additionally have several affordable premium plans for the clients who need additional shopping cart features. 
Contentshelf also offers a built in MicroSite Builder that helps to integrate Apps making it a complete solution for selling both tangible and digital products. Made with an ultra-modern look and feel, and with a streamlined checkout procedure, it has a professional look and can easily attract buyers. 
Another plus to this option is that it’s scalable and is designed to grow as the business grows, increasing the storage space when needed. The Contentshelf has more than fifty features and more are still being developed. 
Volusion This solution offers hundreds of free and premium high-quality templates which is an attractive feature for those looking for more design control on the look and feel of their businesses shopping experience. The template can be customized according to visually emulate the brand experience you wish to display in the overall experience, from start to finish. This option allows users to create detailed listings for their products as well as include images and videos. The software has innovative tools which monitor the product count and alerts when they are running low. 
Volusion also has built-in social media, marketing and SEO tools which helps to promoting your business and inviting more customers to visit and shop your brand. Content can also be optimized which is a huge plus. Another conversion bonus is that it has the capability to send emails and posts on social media when you’re logged in as an admin. 
With increasing trends in e-commerce, the options for online shopping carts will see an upturn in solutions offered in the industry. Companies will be competing for your business, offering more and more features to make running your business more smoothly and, namely, equate to increased conversion rates. However, keep in mind that the security of the shopping cart solution you’re considering should be at the forefront of your decision. Securing your customers payment information has to be a top priority to protect them from cyber criminal attacks, and ensuring your business runs smoothly and profitably.
